original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE v.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-28 07:25:55' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Views>=0 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=15 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-03 11:45:16' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-18 17:19:53' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-28 07:25:55'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.UserId=E3.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND users.Views >= 0 AND users.DownVotes >= 0 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 15) AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-03 11:45:16' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-18 17:19:53')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.UserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3E4.UserId)
